attributes.action: permit the handing out of Education Maintenance Allowance to ALL students who choose to go on to further full-time education
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe it is unfair that certain students are granted EMA based solely on there parents pay. This is wrong for many reasons but mainly just because parents/guardians have the money does not mean that they do give us the same money a week as EMA recievers. All should get EMA or none.
